item.title: Data, Pipelines, The second POC - A JP-EN Dictionary

Creating Sakuryo’s Dictionary

In my ideas post I mentioned that the app will need data sources and a way to query them though a catalog/dictionary

item.title: Draw the Kana - Version 2
item.description:
Can I write Hiragana Correctly? Let’s See! Version 2

In the last post I expressed some dissatisfaction with the current prototype and some ideas about changes I could make

item.title: Initial Ideas Must Haves for the App
item.description:
What Sakuryo can do for Me

I like data and I love to see visually my progress in Learning Japanese. I want a way to see where I am at and feel good about my progress. I also want to see very clearly, opportunities for improvement.

item.title: My first Proof of Concept - Draw the Kana
